title: Add the provided Google AdSense verification script to the site <head>

requirements.text: Ensure the Google AdSense script with client ID `ca-pub-5965886176480370` is present in the document <head> for the CurrencyPal website (i.e., loaded on the initial page load and therefore applicable to all SPA routes/pages), matching the user-provided snippet, and without creating duplicate script tags.

quotes:
<script async src="https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js?client=ca-pub-5965886176480370"
     crossorigin="anonymous"></script> 
(This is the code , please add it on <head></head> on each page of the website)

acceptanceCriteria: On first load, the DOM contains a <script> element in <head> with src exactly `https://pagead2.googlesyndication.com/pagead/js/adsbygoogle.js?client=ca-pub-5965886176480370`.
The script tag has `async` enabled and `crossorigin="anonymous"`.
Navigating between routes/pages in the React SPA does not create additional duplicate AdSense script tags (only one AdSense loader script is present).

requirements.text: Set the frontend configuration so that `VITE_ADSENSE_CLIENT_ID` is configured to `ca-pub-5965886176480370` by default for developers (update `frontend/.env.example` accordingly), while keeping AdSense loading logic compatible with the existing environment-variable-based setup.
acceptanceCriteria: With `VITE_ADSENSE_CLIENT_ID` set to `ca-pub-5965886176480370`, the site loads the AdSense script successfully (no missing-client-id state for AdSense).

constraints: Keep the backend as a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this task.
nonGoals: Do not add new AdSense ad unit placements or change existing ad slot layout/positions (this request is only about the AdSense <head> script/verification code).
Do not integrate third-party authentication methods (only Internet Identity is supported).
